name: Spooky Waltz
description:
Halloween is here!          It's time for the annual Halloween Ball on Halloween Town! Join KaraMaple and Punkpin as they 
          prepare themselves for the most important night of the Year!          Get your moves ready, tune your hear for the beat, and prepare to battle a legion of Cursed Candies
          while you dance to the spooky beat.          Protect your festival from the Old Geezer Gang and drive them off Halloween Town,
          assuring the spookier festival ever!           The game counts on a rhytym bar that's sync with the music. You only move on those beats.
            Make sure that you are moving towards the right direction!           You can destroy all the candies currently transformed, on a straigth line!
          Use this in your favor to build power and score some points!
